title: 454: CHATTY BROS: GRAYSTON’S BIRTHDAY & SOME BIP TAKES!
itunes:title: 454: CHATTY BROS: GRAYSTON’S BIRTHDAY & SOME BIP TAKES!
description:
The Bros might be in two separate states but they are here to chat! They celebrate Grayston’s birthday, discuss personal fears, and give some thoughts on the Bachelor in Paradise premiere!

 

***Tune in Tuesday when The Broads answer questions regarding their recent episode and discuss what is to come & Thursday for a recap of episode 2 and 3 of BIP

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***DAILY HARVEST:  Go to DAILYHARVEST.COM/CHATTY to get up to $40 off your first box! 

***STITCHFIX: Get $20 off their first fix at STITCHFIX.COM/CHATTY 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
